column2: select R.TRANSACTION_ID,PMDB..PM_F_FORMAT_DATE(R.TRANSACTION_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as TRANSACTION_DTM,R.MOBILE_NO,R.RECHARGE_AMT,R.RECHARGE_CHANNEL,R.RECEIPT_NO,R.RECORD_STATUS, R.BILLING_SYSTEM from PMDB..PM_RECHARGE R inner join PMDB..PM_PREPAID_LOAD_BATCH B on (R.BATCH_ID = B.BATCH_ID) where B.ORDER_ID = @order_id
